Class <VarFn>

VarFn-class.Rd

<VarFn> is an S4 class that describes the functional properties of a variable of interest. It enables the specification of a variable as a function of one or more predictors through an expression, thereby describing the relationship between the variable and its explanatory factors. This provides a structured approach to incorporating dynamic dependencies between model components. This class extends from the VarDist class, inheriting its slots.

Developed by Carl Donovan, Bruno Caneco.
